general_advisory: Light to moderate rainfall may occur on Saturday & Sunday with generally cloudy to overcast sky. Keep harvested paddy safe from rain, make provisions for draining excess water, withhold fertilizers and pesticides temporarily.

advisory: Prepare wet nursery seed beds followed by planking
Divide nursery area into smaller plots for convenience
Sow sprouted seeds with proper spacing
Tie panicles of paddy in bundles after rainwater recession
Plant in well-drained soil with good irrigation facilities
Optimum planting time is November to February
Spray Neem based pesticide for Fruit and shoot borer control
Follow up with alternate sprays of Spinosad and Thiodicarb
Apply boron micronutrient at proper stages
